title: TEDx: Emergence of an Alternate Path
description: Delivered talk outlining the ethos of crowdfunding as a disruptive technology enabling grassroots innovation. Emphasized that "some of the best innovations and ideas happen at the grassroots level" as platforms like RocketHub incubate new ideas. Exploring how technology adoption cycles create alternate paths for human progress and social transformation.

title: Augmented Intelligence (AI)
venue: Real Estate Leaders Summit Â· Re.Comm.17 Â· KitzbÃ¼hel, Austria
description: International keynote examining human-AI collaboration and future intelligent systems. Shared stage with Wikipedia's Jimmy Wales and UK politician Nigel Farage. Austrian press noted presence as one of 11 renowned international speakers who "enthused 230 participants" at this elite gathering of global real estate and tech leaders.

title: The Future of Crowdfunding: What the Next 5 Years Will Bring
description: Conference keynote exploring the evolving crowdfunding landscape and predicted industry developments. Event dedicated to mobilization and engagement trends listed Hillel-Tuch (Co-Founder of RocketHub) among its outstanding international lineup. 9-minute keynote available via Campaigning Summit YouTube channel.

title: Open Economy Fundamentals
description: Featured speaker at Belarus conference on open innovation. Explored open economies, crowdsourcing, and collaborative innovation in emerging markets and technology ecosystems.

title: World Crowdfunding Conference
description: Represented the Crowdfunding Professional Association (CfPA) and RocketHub as speaker at this large-scale international forum drawing ~13,000 attendees including government dignitaries. Addressed the global state of crowdfunding and met with Chinese officials, underscoring role as "Top Global Partner" for U.S. crowdfunding outreach in 2015.

title: Hardware Innovation Workshop
description: Panel on crowdfunding for hardware startups at O'Reilly/Make's Hardware Innovation Workshop alongside makers, investors, and industry leaders.
